text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon is Miho Dormitory's<n>beloved dorm
leader—a hot-blooded<n>runner with a passion for
one-on-one<n>challenges.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
To her, races aren't just about running,<n>they're
about the fiery competition with<n>fearsome rivals.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's excited to see what challenges<n>await her in
the upcoming Twinkle<n>Series. Now, it's time to
charge into<n>battle with her!
